title: Artificial Intelligence

definitions.Artificial Intelligence: AI is the simulation of human intelligence processes by computer systems.
definitions.Machine Learning: A method of data analysis that automates analytical model building.
definitions.Neural Networks: A series of algorithms that attempt to recognize underlying patterns in data.
definitions.Deep Learning: A subset of machine learning involving neural networks with multiple layers.

formulas: AI = Intelligence + Machine Learning + Neural Networks + Deep Learning
summary: The slide provides an overview of Artificial Intelligence, including its definition and its components such as Machine Learning, Neural Networks, and Deep Learning. It also includes a formula that combines these elements to represent AI.
